order-history.name: Order History List
order-history.notes: Shows list of past orders. Navigate via account menu > 'Histórico de encomendas'

order-detail.name: Order Detail Page
order-detail.notes: Shows order details, delivery info, product list, and summary. Accessed by clicking order card from order-history page.

cart.name: Shopping Cart
cart.notes: VERIFIED: Shopping cart page with items. All 20 selectors verified against 03-cart-with-items.html snapshot. Includes product cards, prices, quantities, unavailable indicators, totals, and checkout button.

search.name: Product Search Results
search.notes: VERIFIED: Product search results page. Shows grid of product tiles with rich data attributes (data-pid, data-urls, data-gtm). URL format: /pt/pesquisa?q={query}. Tested with 'leite' query (1,059 results, 24 products captured). Key features: searchInput, productTile with data-pid, addToCartButton, quantity selector, price breakdown (main/promo/unit). outOfStockIndicator NOT VERIFIED (all test products were available).

product-detail.name: Product Detail Page
product-detail.notes: Product detail page with full information and recommendations. URL format: /pt/{category-path}/{product-slug}/{pid}.html. Tested with leite and azeite products. Shows 'A Auchan sugere isto...' recommendations section with similar products. Several selectors NOT VERIFIED (only tested with available products).

delivery-slots.name: Delivery Slot Selection
delivery-slots.notes: Delivery slot selection page in checkout flow. Selectors verified with €260+ cart. Uses data attributes: data-time, data-price, data-is-free, data-has-slots-to-book. Day tabs with data-date. Time extraction from innerText when data-time is null.
